General.Name: Black Widow Resources Inc
General.Description: BWR Exploration Inc. engages in the acquisition and exploration of precious and base metal properties in Canada. The company holds interest in the Shunsby project; the Vendome Sud project; and the Little Stull Lake gold project. The company was formerly known as Black Widow Resources Inc. and changed its name to BWR Exploration Inc. in October 2016. BWR Exploration Inc. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: The Canadian Venture Building, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 1P1
